mobile.name: wizard
mobile.long_descr: A wizard walks around behind the counter, talking to himself.
mobile.description:
The wizard looks old and senile, and yet he looks like a very powerful
                   |wizard. He is equipped with fine clothing, and is wearing many fine
                   |rings and bracelets.

mobile.name: baker
mobile.long_descr: The baker looks at you calmly, wiping flour from his face with one hand.
mobile.description:
A fat, nice looking baker. But you can see that he has many scars on his
                   |body.

mobile.name: grocer
mobile.long_descr: A grocer stands at the counter, with a slightly impatient look on his face.
mobile.description: A tall grocer, who moves two 200 pounds bag of flour around on his shoulders.

mobile.name: weaponsmith
mobile.long_descr: A weaponsmith.
mobile.description: A young weaponsmith, who still has lots to learn.

mobile.name: armourer armorer
mobile.long_descr: An armourer stands here.
mobile.description:
An old but very strong armourer, he has made more armours in his
                   |lifetime than you have ever seen.
mobile.offense: bash disarm dodge dirt_kick parry trip

mobile.name: thief
mobile.long_descr: A thief, all dressed in black.
mobile.description: Well COUNT your money!

mobile.name: captain
mobile.long_descr: A retired captain stands here, selling boats.
mobile.description: This captain has killed more sharks than you have eaten peas.

mobile.name: sailor
mobile.long_descr: A sailor stands here, waiting to train you.
mobile.description: He looks like a strong, fit sailor.

mobile.name: boy
mobile.long_descr: A pet shop boy is here, humming gently.
mobile.description: He is young and close-cropped and looks quite happy.

mobile.name: jeweller
mobile.long_descr: The jeweller is standing behind the desk.
mobile.description: He is fat and has a content although watchful look on his face.

mobile.name: leather worker
mobile.long_descr: The leather worker is sitting by the table, sewing a leather cap.
mobile.description:
She looks as an honest, hard-working artisan who only just earns enough to
                   |keep herself going.

mobile.name: Hassan
mobile.long_descr: Hassan is here, waiting to dispense some justice.
mobile.description:
Big. Very big.
                   |Stupid. Very stupid.
                   |
                   |Hassan, the guardian of  the Temple of Mota, towers over you.  He's over 12 
                   |feet tall, every inch of it muscle. It would be a Bad Thing to commit a crime
                   |in his presence.
mobile.affected_by: detect_evil detect_invis detect_hidden infrared haste dark_vision
mobile.offense: area_attack bash berserk disarm dodge fast kick parry rescue trip crush assist_guard

mobile.name: healer
mobile.long_descr: A healer is here, selling spells.
mobile.description:
Although retired from adventuring, the healer still lends a hand.
                   |Type 'heal' to see a listing of spells.

mobile.name: guildmaster master
mobile.long_descr: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobile.description:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
                   |vast amount of knowledge she possesses. She is wearing fine magic clothing,
                   |and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.

mobile.name: guildmaster master
mobile.long_descr: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobile.description:
You are in no doubt that this guildmaster is truly close to your god; he has
                   |a peaceful, loving look. You notice that he is surrounded by a white aura.
mobile.affected_by: detect_evil detect_invis detect_magic detect_hidden sanctuary dark_vision

mobile.name: guildmaster master
mobile.long_descr: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobile.description:
You realize that whenever your guildmaster moves, you fail to notice it:
                   |the way of the true thief.  She is dressed in poor clothing, having
                   |the appearance of a beggar.
mobile.offense: backstab disarm dodge fast dirt_kick trip

mobile.name: guildmaster master
mobile.long_descr: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobile.description:
This is your master. A short, strong dwarf with bulging muscles.  Several scars
                   |across his body prove that he was using arms before you were born.  He
                   |has a calm look on his face.
mobile.offense: area_attack bash berserk disarm kick parry

mobile.name: sorcerer
mobile.long_descr: A sorcerer is guarding the entrance.
mobile.description:
He is an experienced mage who has specialized in the field of Combat Magic.
                   |He is here to guard the Mage's Guild and his superior knowledge of offensive
                   |as well as defensive spells make him a deadly opponent.

mobile.name: templar
mobile.long_descr: A knight templar is guarding the entrance.
mobile.description:
He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the Faith.
                   |His duty is to protect the faithful from persecution and infidel attacks and
                   |his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes him a deadly
                   |opponent.

mobile.name: assassin
mobile.long_descr: An assassin is guarding the entrance.
mobile.description:
He is a thief who has specialized in killing others as effectively as possible,
                   |using all sorts of weapons.  His superior knowledge of how and where to use
                   |them combined with his extraordinary stealth makes him a deadly opponent.

mobile.name: knight
mobile.long_descr: A knight is guarding the entrance.
mobile.description:
He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless
                   |chivalrous deeds.  His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his
                   |extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly
                   |opponent.
mobile.offense: area_attack bash berserk disarm fast kick parry

mobile.name: bartender
mobile.long_descr: A bartender watches you calmly, while he skillfully mixes a drink.
mobile.description: A tired looking Bartender who hates trouble in his bar.

mobile.name: waiter
mobile.long_descr: A waiter is going around from one place to another.
mobile.description: A tired looking waiter.

mobile.name: waiter
mobile.long_descr:
A man who in his young days was a famous sorcerer but now leads a quiet,
                  |peaceful life as a waiter.

mobile.name: waiter
mobile.long_descr: A waiter who seems to have reached contact with God.

mobile.name: waiter
mobile.long_descr: A waiter who knows where all his customers keep their money.

mobile.name: waiter
mobile.long_descr: A waiter who easily could kill you, and still carry quite a few firebreathers.

mobile.name: filthy
mobile.long_descr: Filthy is standing here, eager to serve you a special drink.
mobile.description:
Filthy looks real, ehm, dirty. He likes to keep his costumers happy,
                   |but do not mess with him or else he'll get upset.

mobile.name: cityguard guard
mobile.long_descr: A cityguard stands here.
mobile.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm parry rescue assist_guard assist_vnum

mobile.name: janitor
mobile.long_descr: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.

mobile.name: fido dog
mobile.long_descr: A beastly fido is here.
mobile.description:
Fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat hanging
                   |around its teeth.

mobile.name: vagabond
mobile.long_descr: A vagabond is here, looking for victims.
mobile.description: He looks pretty mean.

mobile.name: drunk
mobile.long_descr: A singing, happy drunk wanders around, singing about Moria.
mobile.description: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to carry too much money.

mobile.name: beggar
mobile.long_descr: A beggar is here, asking for a few coins.
mobile.description: The beggar looks like she is fed up with life.

mobile.name: cat
mobile.long_descr: An alley cat hisses at you.
mobile.description: The alley cat is half starved and more than a little feral.

mobile.name: cityguard guard
mobile.long_descr: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.
mobile.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm parry rescue assist_guard assist_vnum

mobile.name: cityguard guard
mobile.long_descr: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.
mobile.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm parry rescue assist_guard assist_vnum

mobile.name: cityguard guard
mobile.long_descr: A cityguard is here, guarding the mayor.
mobile.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm fast parry rescue assist_guard assist_vnum

mobile.name: shopkeeper old man
mobile.long_descr:
An old man eyes you greedily.
                  |The old man says, 'Would you like to buy a nice love potion?'
mobile.description: He looks very dangerous.  I wouldn't try to rob him.

mobile.name: cityguard guard
mobile.long_descr: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate alertly.
mobile.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm parry rescue assist_guard assist_vnum

mobile.name: cityguard guard
mobile.long_descr: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.  He is half asleep.
mobile.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm parry rescue assist_guard assist_vnum

mobile.name: kitten cat pet
mobile.long_descr: A small loyal kitten is here.
mobile.description: The kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

mobile.name: puppy dog pet
mobile.long_descr: A small loyal puppy is here.
mobile.description: The puppy looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

mobile.name: beagle dog pet
mobile.long_descr: A small, quick, loyal beagle is here.
mobile.description: The beagle looks like a fierce fighter.

mobile.name: rottweiler dog pet
mobile.long_descr: A large, loyal rottweiler is here.
mobile.description: The rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.

mobile.name: wolf pet
mobile.long_descr: A large, trained wolf is here.
mobile.description: The wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.

mobile.name: eagle bird pet
mobile.long_descr: A loyal eagle circles overhead.
mobile.description: The eagle looks like a strong fierce fighter.

mobile.name: lion pet
mobile.long_descr: A large, faithful lion is here.
mobile.description: The great lion looks very fierce.

mobile.name: tiger pet
mobile.long_descr: A great, loyal tiger is here.
mobile.description: The large, striped tiger looks like a savage fighter.

mobile.name: maid
mobile.long_descr: The maid is waiting for your order.
mobile.description:
She is very beautiful with golden hair, and deep blue eyes. A good reason
                   |for coming here more often.

mobile.name: sexton
mobile.long_descr: A sexton is sitting here, drinking hot tea.
mobile.description: The sexton looks like he is relaxing after another grave-digging job.

mobile.name: swan
mobile.long_descr: A swan is swimming around in the pond.
mobile.description: The white swan is very elegant.

mobile.name: duckling
mobile.long_descr: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.
mobile.description: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.

mobile.name: sparrow
mobile.long_descr: A sparrow is flapping around on the ground.
mobile.description: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.

mobile.name: duck
mobile.long_descr: A duck is here, quacking happily.
mobile.description: The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life.

mobile.name: captain
mobile.long_descr: The captain of the guard is looking very upset.
mobile.description: A big, strong, angry captain.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm fast parry rescue assist_vnum

mobile.name: cityguard guard
mobile.long_descr: A cityguard stands here, looking very upset.
mobile.description: A big, strong, angry guard.
mobile.offense: bash berserk disarm fast parry rescue assist_vnum

mobile.name: secretary
mobile.long_descr: A secretary is sitting at the desk.
mobile.description:
She looks very busy.
                   |The Secretary says 'Sorry, but the Mayor is extremely busy today'.
                   |The Secretary says 'Please sit down and have a seat in the meantime'.

mobile.name: mayor
mobile.long_descr: The mayor is here.  He shakes your hand.
mobile.description: He is a stocky, middle-aged man with thin, grey hair.

mobile.name: crier
mobile.long_descr: The town crier is here, weeping quietly.
mobile.description: He is very good at his job - completely dissolved in tears.

mobile.name: esme waitress
mobile.long_descr: Esme the waitress hums to herself and wonders what you'd like to order.
mobile.description:
Esme brushes a lock of dark hair away from her wire-rimmed glasess and
                   |smiles warmly at you.

mobile.name: Melancholy
mobile.long_descr: Melancholy is here, digging through a pile of scrolls, papers, and maps.
mobile.description:
Ragged brown hair frames a ghostly, pale face.  Puffy eyelids surround two
                   |sky blue, haunting eyes.  An old, brown robe is wrapped around her frail 
                   |frame.  She looks up from her pile of papers and maps and looks inquiringly
                   |at you, smiling faintly.

mobile.name: lister green tree snake
mobile.long_descr: A green tree snake is sitting here on a pile of books.
mobile.description:
This is Melancholy's pet tree snake, Lister.  Something seems odd about his 
                   |jaw, almost as if he were smiling at you.  He's quite friendly, but don't
                   |get him drunk.

mobile.name: otho money changer moneychanger
mobile.long_descr: Otho the Money Changer sits behind his desk, waiting for your coins.
mobile.description:
Otho is grotesquely fat man dressed in rich clothes.  Apparently the money
                   |changing business pays quite well in this busy city, or possibly the rumors
                   |of his fencing services are true...

mobile.name: thief
mobile.long_descr: A thief, all dressed in black.
mobile.description: Well COUNT your money!
